content: Hey BitcoinTalk Friends,Let us introduce ourselves - a new crash game site - Weed Daddy just launched!¬†Find us here: https://weeddaddy.io/ ‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è The latest promo at Weed Daddy ‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏èClaim your WEEKLY GIVEAWAY https://forms.gle/Y2Dx98yiHinjUv4Y8- Remember to sign up at Weed Daddy & fill in this form- 30 in-site coins ($EED) for 500 players! ¬†Secret Bonus - Free Faucet!For now on till 12/31/2022, You can claim UP TO 3 $EED(in-site coins) per time!PLAY FREE GAME & WIN BIG NOW!Feedback Bonushttps://forms.gle/2P869i6YGY4c8tpN7-Just provide your suggestion, you might get 100 $EED feedback bonus FOR FREE! comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Welcome to the forum Crash game is one of the popular luck-based games and one of the exciting games too this is not the first stand-alone crash game we have here in Bitcoin, and it gets a lot of support from the gambling community if you have the budget I recommend that you hire a designer for your announcement to make it look professionally built, looking forward to playing in your game once it launches.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, your site has a very nice and simple design, I particularly liked the design although I don't play those games that just depend on luck, I wonder if it's worth creating a site that only forces a single type of game while you could take advantage of this and create a website where you have all types of possible games and you would also add sports betting to the website because with that you would capture all types of customers and not just have one type of customer as you currently are, for example in your current case if you ran a subscription campaign on this forum you would have to spend money just to get a specific group of people who like this type of game, the risk of spending money and getting few customers is much greater, but if you had a complete casino with all possible games and sports betting by running a subscription campaign you would be capturing customers of all kinds, the chances of having a good customer base would be greaterQuote from: weeddaddy on November 21, 2022, 06:20:06 AM‚û°Ô∏è What can I do with your in-site coins?Our in-site coin is called $EED. You can use it mainly for playing, and we are going to launch a new feature that‚Äôll let you exchange the $EEDs to USDC! (which means you will get the chance to WIN BIG with our free coins!)Your currency still has no value and hardly anyone will want to claim hours to win something that has no value, why don't you offer bitcoin instead of still creating something that still has no value? or else you wait until your altcoin has value and then open the faucet because at least then people will be able to see the value of your altcoin and will decide if it's worth spending time to claim on the faucet, and I imagine people will have a choice to exchange your altcoin for USDC on your website? because if you are still thinking that after creating your altcoin you have to look for an exchange to add your altcoin then this will be a very long process and no one or a very small number of people will accept using a faucet in that condition of still having to take the altcoin to go trade on one of those small and shady exchanges because new projects always list on those small and shady altcoins

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Hey, do you accept Bitcoin? I just have created an account and got no option to deposit bitcoin. You only have ETH, USDC and USDT on ERC20 which of course isn't great start. Generally, I use Bitcoin but on any case, I try to avoid Ethereum chain.Beside, if you don't accept bitcoin your topic will be removed to altcoin section.

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: weeddaddy on November 21, 2022, 06:20:06 AMüåø Find us here: https://weeddaddy.io/ üåøInteresting choice of the name. Are you going to make the users addicted with your crash game as much as the weed do :-P? The site design is very neat and looks nice. There are no distractions.It's good to see that you already bought the copper membership to be able to post image. But you should consider posting a full image for the ANN like others mainly your competitors did, as example btc365 ann thread. Currently it's just an image at the bottom and all information are in text format. Consider designing an ANN with full image.Besides, you can think of promoting the brand to this community. There are many ways to be active and engage with the community to build a positive brand. If you want we can talk about some of them. Additionally, you can launch a long lasting signature campaign to introduce the project and spread out the words. There are many campaign managers around who can help you promoting your product to this community. You will find them here. I do offer campaign management service and I would love to work together if you consider my service among them.Anyway, welcome to the forum.

comments.body: welcome to the bitcointalk forum, I just registered and claimed that the faucet only gets 1$eed and while the minimum bet is 1$eed so you can only do 1x bet, but it's unique with a new concept of coincidence lately I often play crash games on some casino site, the website is also light and friendly to play on mobile phones, maybe need to add other deposit options such as BNB. comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, i just signed up and claimed the early bird bonus.I must say that the site is poorly developed, took a great deal of to load, I don't know if this is from my end but I have a good network, at a point I had to even turn of my network completely, then turn it back on and refresh the page to see if it will load to the finished.And also, site is not mobile friendly, but I believe that is this is a very new site, there will be lots and lots of developments and improvements in the future, so you guys should please work on the sites speed so it doesn't really affects those from places where network signals are really strong.Goodluck and welcome once again.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Ohhh one of my favorite gambling game. I can say that the design is fine for me. I just don't like the game animation, It's just a car that has repeated animation. I like the traditional rocket ones. I'm also concerned about the welcome bonus promotion, I think it can be abused easily given that not even a google account is required to submit a submission to claim the bonus. It is on an early stage and traffic on the casino is not that much, I'm sure it can be improve by the help of suggestion of our fellow forum members. Goodluck to your casino fella!
